text:
It's just a small bug in the configure script for the webapp_module-1.0-tc40:
In line 2277 you query for the local prefix for apache 2.0 (to be later used to
find apr) with:
<<<<<local_prefix="`apxs -q PREFIX`">>>>>
But as you allow to define a different apxs than the default it should instead 
be:
<<<<<local_prefix="`${APXS} -q PREFIX`">>>>>
Aside from that: wow, good work!!!!
creator: michael@mfuchs.de
pier@betaversion.org
text:
This is available in the nightly CVS snapshots at http://nagoya.apache.org/
~pier/
